cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Education and Labor on July 15, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2119, Family Violence Prevention and Services Improvement Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 54 (Tuesday, March 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. McBATH:
H.R. 2119.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8: Congress has the power ``to regulate
commerce with foreign nations, and among the several states,
and with the Native American tribes''
[Page H1621]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 156.

title: Family Violence Prevention and Services Improvement Act of 2021
